name: TRS-80 Checkers
overview: TRS-80 Checkers is a single-player versus computer board game for the TRS-80. It has graphical representations of checkers, which allows the player to set the board as a new game or whatever configuration they wish. The human player is always white, while the computer is black. All moves are via text commands. The gamefFollows international rules, where if an option to take a player's piece is available, the player must move.
